name: Shinkai: Instagram Poster
description: Tool for posting images to Instagram with a caption and hashtags based on theme
author: Shinkai

sqlTables.name: posts
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE posts (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, image_path TEXT NOT NULL, caption_theme TEXT NOT NULL, post_id TEXT NOT NULL, success BOOLEAN NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

sqlQueries.name: Get successful posts by theme
sqlQueries.query: SELECT * FROM posts WHERE caption_theme = :caption_theme AND success = true
